channel.title: Allstar Scape
channel.description: Hi mopar, I decided to remake allstar scape from a cleaned delta. It is very stable so far.. I am almost done re making the home.. I have re made the shops.. I am going to add all of the origional customs and the skilling area is done. The economy will be great.. I am planning on adding lots of newer content like dragon claws and god swords.. please post positive and constructive feedback.. also any recomendations

item.title: Allstar Scape
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

Fails:

I didn’t speak to soon, I doubt it was ever stable in any way.

When it says in quotes “so far” it really isn’t lmao…wanna know why?? cuz it’s a Delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar Scape
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:5, topic:465950”]wL is wL.

‘It is very stable’ Are you serious? Do you really believe that delta can be stabilized? Anyways, good luck I guess.[/quote]

Poopoo999:

It is very stable so far…

spoke too soon

item.title: Allstar Scape
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“poopoo999, post:3, topic:465950”][quote author=Togasa link=topic=573153.msg4139609#msg4139609 date=1352015466]
eh…you’re making a remake, not using the actual allstarscape base though.
I would support it, like it, and try to help it if was an ACTUAL allstar.
Sorry.

Plus my hate for Delta’s is beginning to surface.
[/quote]
Well… Isn’t allstar winterlove based? and so is delta…[/quote]
Well… isn’t a Delta source a Delta source?
…and an Allstarscape source and Allstarscape source?

Ok then, so if you wanna make an Allstar server USE AN ALLSTAR SOURCE. thanks.

Read full topic
